channel.title: **~STanding Up for your creation - Say No to Jagex~**
channel.description:
[center]Fed up with Fagex removing your source from every website you upload it too?
Then host it with us!
What do we offer?
Up to 100Mbs 200MB Uploader Removal Link Safe and secure SQLi [/center]
[b]TOS[/b]
[url=http://rune-planet.com]Uploading TOS[/url]
[b]We are currently Hosting[/b] [url=http://rune-planet.com]Click here to view how many files we are hosting[/url]
[b]UPLOAD[/b] [url=http://rune-planet.com]Upload Now[/url]
[i]Thanks![/i]

item.title: **~STanding Up for your creation - Say No to Jagex~**
item.dc:creator: @S_v2 .S. v2
item.description:
@S_v2 wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:23, topic:470916”][quote author=hack3r link=topic=588447.msg4183488#msg4183488 date=1355818054]
Why dont people think…
How do jagex even get your links? They find your advertisment and thats enough proof to win anything, eg a court hearing.

Dont advertise anything on youtube or any forum simply advertise on chats

Jagex is clamping down and its not long untill the owner of the big servers start getting in trouble
[/quote]

the only thing we have of theirs is some of the protocols (i think thats right?) and someone wrote a custom one, we no longer need theirs but people keep using it[/quote]

And their client, their graphics, their music, their maps…

Read full topic

item.title: **~STanding Up for your creation - Say No to Jagex~**
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Davidi2:

Either way the answer to ‘question’ is “the owner of this site”… the other sites only remove them because they don’t give a shit about RSPS so they do whatever a large business says. Not saying this guy does, but I’m just saying the way you worded your (supposed to be rhetorical) question is dumb, and someone could easily deny jagex the same was Moparisthebest does.

Well yes, but MSCP isn’t doing anything wrong, and this kid is hosting their code [you can argue that it isn’t their code anymore, but that can go on forever]

Read full topic

item.title: **~STanding Up for your creation - Say No to Jagex~**
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:16, topic:470916”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=588447.msg4173463#msg4173463 date=1354667612]
The people in the quote train are wrong - the thing stopping Jagex from taking down links on privately owned websites is that YOU ARE THE OWNER OF THE WEBSITE. With these other big sites, Jagex has contacted the site owners and gives them links that they want taken down. In a privately owned website, they may contact you, but then you don’t have to take them down unless you want to (or if they take you to court and you lose).

Also, listen to zyle. Right now your links direct to a server advertisement, and if you don’t change that you will get infracted for underhanded advertising
[/quote]
I’m aware of that entirely, but I doubt this kid will not listen to Jagex when they issue over the court papers.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: **~STanding Up for your creation - Say No to Jagex~**

item.title: **~STanding Up for your creation - Say No to Jagex~**
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The people in the quote train are wrong - the thing stopping Jagex from taking down links on privately owned websites is that YOU ARE THE OWNER OF THE WEBSITE. With these other big sites, Jagex has contacted the site owners and gives them links that they want taken down. In a privately owned website, they may contact you, but then you don’t have to take them down unless you want to (or if they take you to court and you lose).

Also, listen to zyle. Right now your links direct to a server advertisement, and if you don’t change that you will get infracted for underhanded advertising

Read full topic
